title: Trimmed Clip Shared to Claim Unnao Cop Thrashed Unconscious Farmer
subtitle: Fact Check of a farmer lying half dead on the ground: A video from the Unnao farmer protest, where a man is seen mercilessly being lathi-charged by the police, is doing rounds on social media. Video ends with the man lying on the ground unconscious.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video from the Unnao farmer protest, where a man is seen mercilessly being lathi-charged by the police, is doing the rounds on social media. The video ends with the man lying on the ground unconscious.

Many netizens shared the same video with a claim that the police continues to thrash the farmers despite his condition.

Congress leader Priyanka Gandhi too shared the 22-second-long video with the same claim but later took it down.
